short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save highlighted text to a list

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clipper Snipper is a Chrome extension that allows you to save and manage text snippets from any web page easily. With Clipper Snipper, you can keep track of important pieces of information and access them anytime you need, all in one convenient place.
